chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:
The phone initially flashed green and then shut off. When charging, it still made a charging sound. However, the screen was black and the phone could no longer be turned on. At the store, I was told that the screen is broken.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
